name: PuncHarder
description:
Puncharder is a mobile casual arcade game, where the player has to beat an opponent by using different gestures.

The fight is frenetic and there’s no time to relax, you can only dodge and counter attack  to win fights.

Practice against differents opponents in the "Training" mode.

DEVELOPED BY:

- Andrea Bettin (Game Designer)                  

- Michael Rizzolo (Game Programmer)

This game is a school project made in one month, eventually it can be updated with new features and modalities!
